name: Puzzling Presents
description:
You play as a sentient unopened present box that has been lost on a snowy island in the middle of nowhere for some reason.

Return all of the presents(including yourself) underneath the tree at the center of the island by solving the interconnected puzzles that have been set out for you. Along the way, you can find new abilities and mechanics to help or hinder your task. 

Good Luck, and Happy Holidays!

The game does NOT save your progress.
also Feel free to ask for hints in the comments if you get stuck :)
